presentation: Hello, my name is Gabriel Morikawa! Nice to meet you!
I am a Brazilian Software Engineer with a degree in Game Development, and currently living in Japan.
Yes! Game Development! I've loved playing games since I was a child, and I wanted to understand how they are made. But I can also develop systems and create websites.
I am driven by curiosity and challenge. Let's talk!
skills_warning: The following is a list of tools that I‘ve already used. But it does not mean that I have mastered those tools.
It only means that I know enough to not type code randomly expecting things to work based on brute force (or excpecting a miracle).
